function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disruption of social norms and practices due to the pandemic","Impact":"Changes in social behavior and norms can lead to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, promotion of healthy practices, and policy interventions to guide societal behavior","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for dissemination of information, monitoring and tracking systems for disease spread","People":"General public, social institutions, businesses","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on clean and reliable energy resources in stimulus packages","Impact":"Missed opportunity to invest in renewable energy, leading to continued reliance on non-renewable energy sources","Mitigation":"Inclusion of clear policies and financial incentives for renewable energy in stimulus packages","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies (solar, wind, hydro), energy efficiency measures, smart grid systems","People":"Government, energy businesses, investors","Owner":"Government, energy regulatory bodies, renewable energy industry organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination and information sharing in pandemic response","Impact":"Inefficient and ineffective management of outbreaks, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Standardized communication protocols, data-sharing platforms, and international cooperation for information exchange","Technologies":"Data management systems, communication networks, real-time tracking and monitoring tools","People":"Health professionals, government agencies, international organizations","Owner":"Health ministries, WHO, international health agencies"}]}
